QuestData.Title: Trading Favors: Necrotic Wake
QuestData.Description:
We of the brokers place value on things that may seem strange to an outsider like yourself. Objects that are unusual or one-of-a-kind are things we may find more valuable than others.
So let us make a deal, hm? Should you find yourself in possession of one such object, I will offer a trade for something you may find more valuable.
I hear that the forces of Maldraxxus have made an attack on Bastion. Such things rarely happen without objects of power in tow, no?
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain Nalthor's Phylactery Instructions from Nalthor the Rimebinder in the Necrotic Wake.
QuestData.RewardText:
Ah, quite a find. We rarely get a glimpse into the mechanisms by which the House of Rituals enact their dark designs. I am eager to delve into this tome, purely in the interests of knowledge, of course.
You may choose from some of our procured items as a reward.
